name: cute duck amigurumi
notes:
learn how to create this cute duck amigurumi with this free duck crochet pattern. this is an easy to crochet pattern, perfect for beginners. it is also very quick to make, takes a few hours.

you can use any yarn to make it. i made a small keychain mini duckling from sport weight cotton yarn and a bigger duck from chenille super bulky plush yarn. the pattern has a full video included on how to make this cute duck amigurumi.

link to written pattern: 
[free duck amigurumi crochet pattern][1]

link to video: 
[free duck amigurumi video tutorial][2]


  [1]: https://www.mariskavos.nl/free-duck-crochet-pattern/
  [2]: https://youtu.be/jdpqda084xg
